newsitem.title: FINLAND: ALANDSBANKEN TO EXPAND FURTHER ON MAINLAND.
newsitem.headline: ALANDSBANKEN TO EXPAND FURTHER ON MAINLAND.

text.p: Finnish Aland Islands-based bank Alandsbanken Ab said on Friday it plans to expand in mainland Finland and to open a branch in Espoo this year.
"We will expand further on the mainland with focus on the greater Helsinki area," Jan Talqvist, head of Alandsbanken's mainland operations told a news conference.
"Our next move is to open a branch office in Espoo's Tapiola this year," said Talqvist.
Alandsbanken already has five branch offices on mainland: in Vaasa, Turku, Tampere, Parainen and Helsinki.
The bank said all its mainland branches were profitable.
